name: Lucid (itch) (Ajay_FFA)
description:
Lucid is a first person platforming game set in abstract environments.
The goal of the game is to collect keys to advance to next levels and
ultimately escape the dream.

Credits:
Derreck O'Niel: Programmer
Carl Wiggins: Level Design
Carlo Ocasio: 3D-modeling/ Environment
Kevin Hernandez : 3D-Modeling
Jeremy Santiago: Music and UI

"this is a school project/ Alpha build"
